title: Strictly's Will nearly breaks leg in horror fall as Janette gives emotional update
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest Strictly Come Dancing stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Will Bayley has been forced to pull out of tonight's Strictly Come Dancing after nearly breaking his leg.

The Paralympic champion was supposed to be performing a jive but was missing from the Halloween special following his nasty injury.

When Will's slot to dance arrived, viewers watched the awful moment when he fell awkwardly during rehearsals.

Will can be seen writhing on the floor in agony while the medical team rush in alongside worried partner Janette Manrara.

After he jumped off the table and collapsed, Will admitted he landed with straight legs and feared the worst.

(Image: BBC)

(Image: BBC)

In a video clip, the table tennis champion said: ""I jumped off a table and as I landed I landed with straight legs. I thought I'd broke my leg as I'd never felt anything like that before.

"But fortunately its not as severe as what I thought when I first did it."

"To hear the words 'I absolutely can’t dance' was really gutting for me but I need to recover now and come back even stronger next week."

(Image: BBC)

(Image: BBC)

After Will's video tape, presenter Claudia Winkleman spoke to heartbroken Janette about her injured partner.

Giving an update on his condition, Janette said: "Well he’s obviously a bit gutted he couldn’t be with us dancing the jive that he absolutely loved all week. He’s at home on icing, taking care of himself and resting.

"Fingers crossed he comes back next week. Will, I love you, if you’re watching you know my heart is with you."

(Image: BBC)

Will was looking forward to building on his sensational couples' choice routine from last week, but was injured in a brutal twist of fate.

Hopeful for his return next week, Janette added: "He is such a lively spirit. Everyone who knows Will knows how happy he is as a person.

"We went from Foxtrot to an emotional contemporary. He was looking forward to being loud and energetic.

"These things happen and we’re looking forward to coming back strong. You’ve got this champ."

(Image: BBC)

Strictly fans took to Twitter to give their best wishes to injured Will.

One viewer said: "Was so looking forward to Will and Janette this week and the jive but we all look forward to seeing you next week. Hoping for a speedy recovery."

"Woah gutted about @WillBayleytt . He’s using his knees a lot in his dances : please get better soon Will," added another.

A third agreed: "Will and janette are both so sweet and so humble, im so much sadder than i thought i was going to be about not seeing their halloween performance"

"Gutted for Will and Janette tonight. Hope he's able to dance next week," said a fourth.

(Image: BBC)

(Image: Supplied by WENN)

Under the rules of Strictly at this stage in the competition, Will has been given a bye into the next round.

A Strictly spokesperson said: “Sadly, Will Bayley was injured during training and medics have said he cannot dance in the show this weekend.

"Under the rules of Strictly Come Dancing, Will has been granted a bye to next week.

"Separately, Alex Scott’s partner Neil Jones received an injury whilst training this morning. Kevin Clifton has stepped in to partner Alex in tonight’s show."

(Image: BBC)

Will was not the only casualty of Halloween week, as Neil Jones was also forced to pull out of tonight's show through injury.

Kevin Clifton, who was kicked out of the contest a few weeks ago, returned to partner Alex Scott.

Announcing the bomshell, Claudia said: "You may have also noticed that Neil is missing this week. Unfortunately he also suffered an injury earlier today and is unable to dance tonight.

"But fortunately the amazing Kevin will be stepping in."

*Strictly Come Dancing airs tonight on BBC One at 6.35pm
description: Strictly Come Dancing viewers watched Will Bayley writhing in agony - and heartbroken Janette sent an emotional message
